preqs: ACB2491 or ACC2120 or ACF2491 or ACG2491 or ACW2491 or AFC2120 or AFF2491 or AFG2491 or AFW2491

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ACC3160, ACF3631, ACG3041, ACW3041, AFC3160, AFF3631, AFG3041}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACB2491, ACC2120, ACF2491, ACG2491, ACW2491, AFC2120, AFF2491, AFG2491, AFW2491} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course version {2224, 3806, 3831, 4423, 4436, B2009}

description: This unit examines the auditor's legal liabilities, audit process and evidence, the concepts of materiality and risks, study and evaluation of internal control, EDP auditing, audit sampling techniques, the test of transactions cycles and the verification of account balances, auditors reports, and internal and operational auditing.
